full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Cleaning Services in Victoria

## Request for Proposal (RFP)

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the provision of cleaning services to its office located at 5071 West Saanich Road, Victoria, BC, V9E 3E9.

### Tender Information

* **Title**: Cleaning Services (Victoria)
* **Reference Number**: cb-287-29396985
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: 23-58042
* **Publication Date**: July 24, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 5, 2023, 14:00 EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2026

### Subject Matter

The NRC is seeking a contractor to provide comprehensive building cleaning services to maintain cleanliness and hygiene at its Victoria office. The services required include, but are not limited to, daily cleaning, janitorial services, and waste management.

### Requirements

* The contractor must hold a valid organization security clearance.
* The contractor's proposed personnel must meet the security requirements outlined in Part 6 of the contract.
* The contractor must provide a comprehensive and detailed bid, including all requested pricing details.

### Tender Evaluation

* Proposals will be evaluated based on technical merit and price.
* The lowest or any bid will not necessarily be accepted.

### Important Dates

* Mandatory site visit: August 16, 2023, 9:00 am PST
* Tender closing date: September 5, 2023, 14:00 EDT
* Evaluation and contract award: Following the tender closing date

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Tania Backes
Tania.Backes@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
(613) 410-3834

### Document Attachments

* Solicitation document: [link]
* Addendum 1: [link]
* Addendum 2: [link]

The NRC reserves the right to modify or cancel the tender at any time without notice. All proposals become the property of the NRC. By submitting a proposal, contractors acknowledge that they have read and understood the tender conditions.

Note: I have rephrased the text to follow a standard government tender announcement format and removed unnecessary information. I have also condensed the text to fit within the 400-word limit.
